Package org.jlab.epsci.ersap.std.cli

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.epsci.ersap.std.cli.Config
  • public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
    Environment configuration for a ERSAP shell session.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Config.Builder
      Helps creating the configuration for a shell session.

      • getenv

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getenv()
        Returns an unmodifiable string map view of the custom environment variables set for the shell. These are extra variables to the system environment, defined when the shell was created.

        The variables should be added to the inherited environment when starting a subprocess: 

         ProcessBuilder b = new ProcessBuilder(command);
 b.environment().putAll(config.getenv());
 b.start()
        Returns:
        the custom extra environment as a map of variable names to values
